metadata.titel_preek: Laodicea, Part I: The Great Amen Speaks

kernfrasen: I will spew thee out of my mouth
sourness and sickness and bad odor
something that won't stay on your stomach
half digested comes up all sour and impure
given us a right of way
torn down the wall of partition
no roots in the divine Word
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SALVATION IS THE REMOVAL OF BARRIERS

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: I will vomit you out of my mouth.

cognitieve_implicaties: Indifference is physically revolting to God
The believer is currently 'inside' but at risk of being 'expelled'
theologische_implicaties: God has a 'limit' to what He can tolerate
Apathy is more offensive than active hostility
ethische_implicaties: Fear of being 'distasteful' to the Divine
onbedoelde_consequenties: God as a temperamental biological entity
Salvation viewed as being 'digested' or consumed

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher deliberately revitalizes the dead/conventional 'spew' by translating it back to the visceral 'vomit', re-activating the sensory source domain.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the temperature metaphor (hot/cold) as a bridge between the Medical/Biological domain and the Fire domain. The transition from 'lukewarm' (nausea) to 'hot' (fire) is logically consistent within the text of Revelation.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: GOD IS A ROAD-BUILDER (Highway/Right of way)
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: GOD IS A REVOLUTIONARY (Tearing down walls/Renting veils)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The first implies a structured path provided; the second implies a violent disruption of existing structures.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The fire is personified through the mother's voice, making the abstract 'spiritual fire' a concrete 'warmth' that passes through a physical door.

sterktes.beschrijving: The preacher refuses the 'polite' translation of the Greek 'emeo', forcing the congregation to confront the grossness of the source domain.
sterktes.voorbeeld: The word is not spew; the word is vomit.

risicos.beschrijving: By focusing heavily on the 'vomit' and 'sourness', the preacher risks making God's judgment seem like a visceral reaction rather than a moral decree.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as reactive rather than sovereign.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The ancient city of Laodicea as a failed community under the 'superintending gaze' of God.
sub_worlds: The 1931 childhood home after the father's death
The modern street with crack houses and pornography
The liturgical space of the AME/Baptist church

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective; it moves from abstract judgment to concrete, 'warm' faith.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Use of the 'superintending gaze' and the list of Laodicea's failures.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Using 'tasteless' language (vomit) to break the schema of the 'respectable' pulpit.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Connects Mother's Day (cultural schema) to the 'Mother Church' and parental responsibility.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by Temperature and Biological metaphors. It successfully moves from the 'Cold/Lukewarm' (negative/nauseating) to 'Hot' (positive/burning). The preacher uses these to bridge the gap between ancient text and modern parenting.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'roots' of the Word to the 'rearing' of children to strengthen the agrarian sub-theme.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Word must be planted in the soil of the home before the weeds of the crack house take over.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Link the 'wealth' of the bank to the 'rich food' that causes the spiritual indigestion/vomiting.

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that this fire 'warms' and 'cleanses' rather than burns the children.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: The preacher mentions Laodicea was a clothing center; using 'CLOTHING IS CHARACTER' would fit the biblical text's later mention of white robes.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in revitalizing dead metaphors and using embodied cognition to make a 2000-year-old warning feel physically urgent.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just praising the 'fire' imagery, CMT reveals how the fire functions as a source of heat/security in the 'Text World' of 1931.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'nausea' rather than the experiential learning cycle of the listener.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher's power comes from shifting the 'lukewarm' metaphor from a visual/intellectual category to a gustatory/visceral one.

appendices.notities: The preacher's use of 'fire' to describe his mother's faith is a classic example of the 'AFFECTION IS WARMTH' primary metaphor.
